---
agent: agent
---

## 加上GA Tag


```html
    <script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=G-704JZ9KNS1"></script>
    <script>
      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      function gtag() {
        dataLayer.push(arguments);
      }
      gtag('js', new Date());

      gtag('config', 'G-704JZ9KNS1');
    </script>

```

```javascript
  gtag('event', 'page_view', event.url);
```

## 加上 algoria docsearch

- 參考文件: https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/docsearch
_ 如下列加入
```js
    docsearch({
      appId: '2XJACE5WR2',
      apiKey: '46a06c9f83f755da664540969c8bf344',
      indexName: 'thomascsdio',
      container: '#docsearch',
      debug: false,
    });
```
